column2: till everyone has everything they need #propagandhi #resisting_tyrannical_government
That's exactly why priviledged fucks like me should feel obliged to whine and kick and scream
And yes I recognize the irony. The system I oppose of affords me the luxury of biting the hand that feeds
If it's any consolation I don't begin to understand it. #the_replacements #bastards_of_young
The ones who love us least are the ones we'll die to please.
The ones who love us best are the ones we'll lay to rest. And visit their graves on holidays at best
things weaker than our words for them. #shadow_and_claw #gene_wolfe
Our ways are governed by the artificial categories into which we place essentially undifferentiated things
no matter race or creed or gender #killswitch_engage #vide_infra
Because we are all flesh and blood no one is placed higher than another
